contentrichtext.text: {{Culture of Slovenia}} {{Lists of Slovenians}} '''[[Poets]]''' who wrote or write much of their [[poetry]] '''in [[Slovene language|Slovene]]'''. {{columns-list|3| : [[Fran Albreht]] (1889 -
